profile:
Bathroom-Design-Build is a family owned and run business dedicated to giving you that custom bathroom look for the best possible price. Through a strict work ethic and exceptionally high standards of practice, founder Paul McGeehan invariably provides uniquely creative, high-quality craftsmanship to each customer. Bathroom-Design-Build values genuine, honest, open working relationships and strives to provide such consistency to all customers and business partners. 


At Bathroom Design Build we take great pride in our renovation process. Your bathroom may look stunning on the outside but what is underneath? The foundation materials of any bathroom are the most important aspects and will be the deciding factor as to whether your bathroom lasts two or fifteen years. Using high quality proven products that will stand the test of time, prevent water penetration and most importantly prevent mold growth should not be compromised or overlooked.

profile: We understand that renovations, of any kind, be it a bathroom renovation, kitchen renovation, basement renovation or a new addition, can be stressful. As a general contractor, EA Renovations will take the time to listen to what you want and deliver on it, while making sure your life isn't turned upside down in the process. *** We have brought together a highly skilled team of tradesmen and designers with well over 50 years of combined experience. So whether you need a new deck, a new kitchen, bathroom or an addition, we can get it done for you with the same care and attention that we would put into our own homes. Call now for a free consultation and written estimate!

profile: Modus Enterprises is an independent company, locally owned and operated out of Vancouver, BC, with an office in Calgary, Alberta. Since 1998, a significant focus of our business has been providing certified installations of IKEA kitchens. For the last decade we have coordinated commercial & residential renovation projects with exemplary results. Our adept time management skills & foresight in the role of general contractor & project manager have earned us a portfolio of well-executed renovation projects. We also offer Kitchen planning services and as of several years ago, we have expanded to create focus for our design team to become distinguished as interior design + space planning specialists. Our company can provide full service of project management & contracting for kitchen cabinet installation, floor installation, kitchen design, interior design, and renovation. To see examples of some of our cabinet installation work in person, please visit a showroom at the Richmond or Coquitlam IKEA stores.
services:
- Full residential renovation & project Management
- IKEA Kitchen and Bathroom cabinets

profile:
At Kitchen Installers Vancouver we are an IKEA Certified Installation Company operating throughout British Columbia. Having received accreditation from IKEA in 1992, we have installed thousands of kitchens in the homes of customers and in the IKEA showroom. We have the skills and experience to handle your IKEA Kitchen Renovation from start to finish. 

****

KEALEY Kitchen Installers is a full-service kitchen installation company providing a range of services required by people who have purchased or are considering purchasing an IKEA kitchen. Tom Kealey and his team are seasoned IKEA product professionals and certified IKEA kitchen installers. If you are looking for planning, measuring, assembly and installation, you are in good hands with Tom.

****

Please call TOM at 604-807-1899 for urgent assistance or a free estimate.

services:
KITCHEN ASSEMBLY & INSTALLATION SERVICES:

Although we mainly install IKEA kitchens, we also install kitchens from other manufacturers. We install the following major/local brands:
IKEA,
Home Depot,
RONA,
Merit,
OTHER SERVICES:

When installing your kitchen, we can provide other services that support your kitchen installation, including:
IKEA assembly service,
Kitchen electrical,
Kitchen plumbing,
Countertop installation.
brands: We install the following major/local brands: IKEA, Home Depot, RONA, Merit.
specialities:
Since 1992, KEALEY has provided IKEA assembly services, saving Vancouver and Lower Mainland residents time, frustration and headaches.
If you've just purchased IKEA furniture and are scratching your head looking at the assembly diagram, parts, and bags of screws and widgets, you are not alone. Many people purchase IKEA furniture and forget that what they saw in the store displays was assembled by several workers. Assembly is easy...when you know the product and have assembled it dozens of times, but for many, furniture assembly is a jigsaw puzzle and a time consuming exercise in frustration. That's where we can help. You relax, we do the work. You enjoy the end product.
We assemble most IKEA furniture for any room, including:
Living room furniture,
Bedroom furniture,
Bathroom cabinets, furniture and fixtures,
Complete IKEA kitchens,
Get a free IKEA assembly cost estimate.
name: IKEALEY KITCHEN INSTALLERS VANCOUVER

profile:
We LOVE kitchens!  As a team who cooks, bakes and loves to create – we want your kitchen to be the happy place in your house too. You could call us the kitchen nerds.  We are always up to date on the newest technologies and space-saving solutions and work to blend those with livability and comfort. Our first step is a comprehensive consultation to help best achieve your vision while working with the budget and space. We listen actively to ensure the design suits you, your home and how it's intended to function.

We will create a beautiful conceptual design based on measurements and create the best layout and design for you and how your household functions. We provide a spec book, construction drawings and samples as needed for your contractor and cabinet maker.  We are happy to liaise with your contracting service but are not construction experts.

6+ years of experience, BID from a CIDA accredited program and National Kitchen and Bath Association member.
name: Wallace Consulting Interiors

profile:
Absolute Drying System LTD. is an insurance claim-approved disaster damage rebuild specialist located in Richmond, BC. For combined 25 years, our project management team has been involved in residential and commercial recovery and reconstruction. Repairing properties after water, mold, or fire damage is our expertise. We are there for you every step of the way at every stage of your disaster, including the initial inspection, which allows us to better understand how the damage was caused. If you need assistance with your insurance claim, we are there for the meeting with the adjuster so that we can agree on the repairs that are needed to have your business or home back to normal fast.

We are proud to be a one-stop provider of restoration, cleanup, and maintenance services for any residential or commercial property—no matter the size of the property or the scope of the project. Whether your property has suffered damage and you need post-restoration cleaning or you simply wish to set up an ongoing maintenance plan, ABSOLUTE Drying System Ltd. is ready to help.
products: Our services include residential & commercial repairs and maintenance. We are certified, licensed, and insurance-approved restoration & reconstruction specialists. We can provide all aspects of restoration services.
services: Water Damage Restoration, Fire Restoration, Storm Restoration, Mold Remediation, Odor Remove,  and Post- Restoration including Flooring, Drywall & Paint, Kitchen & Bath, Basement Renovation,
warranty_terms: 2 years of workmanship & 10 years of manufacture
name: Absolute Drying System LTD.

profile:
We offer an end-to-end client experience that includes seamless communication, budgeting, staffing, on-site organization, and solid, quality work every time. Our past projects include new luxury residential construction, renovations, restorations and commercial tenant improvements. Occupied and fully operational job sites are never a problem. And we can also plan, manage, and build multi-phase jobs. 

In order to succeed in the construction industry, a general contractor must integrate superior craftsmanship, experience, and dedication within the company’s culture. But a contractor is only as good as his team — and we are committed to hiring experienced professionals who share in our commitment to quality.

We believe that teamwork, integrity, honesty, and attention to detail each step of the way, makes the best construction environment for everyone — which ultimately leads to greater customer satisfaction.

profile:
DG Design & Build founder, Dylan Grandinetti was raised in the construction industry. Being entrenched in a family business taught him the value of hard work and the skill required to succeed. Building on 15+ years of experience, it’s Dylan’s drive and further education that propelled him to bring DG Design & Build to the highest level of home builders and renovation contractors. 

Social stability, environmental sustainability, and economic awareness are the driving forces behind our work. We stand by our quality and exceed clients' expectations. What motivates us is being able to turn a concept or idea into a logical and practical creation.  We always look forward to every opportunity to deliver and satisfy our clients.

The goal at DG Design & Build is for you to be so satisfied with our service and your final product, that we change your perception of the way construction companies operate. All necessary steps are taken to ensure transparency and correct project execution to fully involve our clients. The combination of our exceptional planning, project management and your vision ensures your dreams will become a reality.
